====Trophies==== ==Championships in Turkey==
*'' Turkey's Clubs Championship: Champions (9): 1988, 1989, 1996, 1997, 1998, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2008 Runners-up (4): 1966, 1990, 1995, 2006
*'' Turkish Championship: Champions (9): 1985, 1986, 1987, 1994, 2000, 2001, 2005, 2007, 2008
*'' Istanbul Championship:
Champions (23+): 1947, 1957, 1962, 1964, 1965, 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1972, 1985, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1997, 2002, 2007
